content: Martin (the developer) offers great support. The app kept dropping off and he answered within a few hours on a weekend & provided a solution (it was to do with changing one thing in Android's assumed power settings for the Hify app - took less than 30 seconds). music stops after fews seconds playing. please fix the bugs soon.

content: Worked but killed battery life. I'm not sure why there isn't an option where it remains in the background unless you request it. Overall it works and is simple to setup, but despite paying for the app am removing it due to the battery draining issues
replyContent: Hey Hugh, please excuse the problem. This is related to a "machine learning"-service installed on Samsung-devices that silently restarts HiFy on "good guess" in the background, causing it to drain your battery. Please contact me at support@hify.eu for a previev of HiFy 2.0. I think I might have finally solve this issue. Kind regards from Germany.

content: Does exactly what it says on the tin, basically zero setup required for my Sony phone to finally link with my Pioneer LX receiver. content: Well done, finally I can connect my android phone with apple TV and homepod. There are some delays (5 secs) for changing songs. Anyway, I can accept that.
replyContent: Hey Roni, thanks for the nice feedback. The AirPlay-protocol has a by Apple pre-defined buffer-time of 2 seconds. This plus some additional network-delay is the reason for the delay of ~5 seconds in your case :) Anyway, enjoy your music and kind regards from Germany.

content: Super cool app for older receivers, wish it was a little less laggy but totally worth the money

Initial review: Just installed the trial yesterday and purchased the regular version today. Super easy to use and sounds great. Fantastic, 5 Stars. I have a Pioneer amp that use to play spotify---since Pioneer have stopped paying Spotify for integration I could no longer use it. Excellent app and do exactly what it says. It allows you to play music from Spotify via Airplay or DLNA from your Android device. It essentially gives you two more streaming connection options from Spotify. From my experience I find Airplay and DLNA much more stable than Spotify Connect and the quality much better than Bluetooth.
Works flawless with a Yamaha RX V-773 receiver! The receiver recognizes the device as an AirPlay device, displaying song info and all that.

This app is awesome, now I can finally enjoy Spotify with my Yamaha NP2000 network player is to bad Spotify dropped support for DLNA devices to many great Stereo/Recivers with great sound hope the developers keep supporting the app. Or offer pay support. content: Had airspot, which became very unstable. Dev told me to install this new version, which meant paying AGAIN - and guess what? It has all the same issues. Most times it just doesn't connect, and when it does it will do hiccups or randomly disconnect for no apparent reason. Even with my phone right next to the airplay and with full WiFi...
replyContent: Hey Karen, please excuse the problem. Of course you not have to pay again, just send me an e-mail so I can add you as a user as well. We have been forced to replace AirSpot by Spotify, this wasn't our decision. Please contact me at support@hify.eu and we will try to get it working for you and of course refund your money :) Kind regards from Germany

content: Works perfectly for me, and in case it doesn't, the support from the developer is excellent. I strongly recommend :)
it worked but since a week it does not show up anymore in spotify. When it still worked it looks it was draining my battery after stopping playing music...
replyContent: Hey Arno, the latest Spotify-app has issues to discover local devices. Please use the "Cannot see receiver?"-entry within HiFy's menu, or use a Windows-/MAC-instance of Spotify for the first connection. Once connected the first time, the issue should normally be gone. Please contact me at support@hify.eu for any help, eg. for the battery-issue :)

content: it works but its not that good cant really hold the connection, very slow even on a S9+ it comes to a point of why even bother with it
replyContent: Hey Joe, this might be related to the energy-saver of your S9+. Please contact me at support@hify.eu then we can have a look on it :) Kind regards from Germany.

content: works great!
It doesn't work with Panasonic UHD Bluray players.
replyContent: Hey Ernest, it's possible that your player just doesn't support the default used audio-format. Can you please try the other audio-formats within HiFy's menu unter "DLNA-codec"? Pretty sure this will do the trick, otherwise please contact me at support@hify.eu :) Kind regards from Germany.

content: Hello, I bought the app and (1) it crashes pretty often up to know and (2) could you tell me where you extract the sound? I am using a "bit perfect" DAC output, but I am not sure if the sound quality is any better than the standard android output via the spotify app? Is the Android conversion already done before you take out the signal? UPDATE: Could you give me your email? Can't find your contacts... I have other issues I would like to discuss, e.g. pause is not working :)
replyContent: Hey Jan, my e-mail is support@hify.eu - I am looking forward to your message :) Kind regards from Germany.

content: worked fine, but suddenly can't find my device. If this does not get fixed with a update, it was quite the expensive temporary workaround.
replyContent: Hey Domi, this is often just a temporary issue by Spotify. Please reboot your Android and/or restart Spotify and the problem should be solved. Please contact me via email if the issue persists üòÄ kind regards from Germany

content: When a song finished it doesn't maintain connection established with my TV so i need to reconnect each song to listen it. sometimes it can playing a few songs but I'm getting loses connection constantly
replyContent: Hey Luis, thanks for your feedback. This is often a problem with DLNA-receivers and maybe my local development-version could solve your issue. Would you please contact me via e-mail at support@hify.eu for a preview? Looking forward to your message and kind regards from Germany :)

content: My device is visible in the Hify App no problem, but it does not show up in spotify. Even when I share my credentials to create a login-token, and the login is succesfull, nothing happens.  After this point there is no clue as to what to do, no support and thus no solutions! Very frustrating!  - ;My appologies!! After restarting my phone the device showed up on spotify, and it works beautifully!
replyContent: Hey Nanna, please excuse the problem and thanks for the update. I'm happy to read you found the solution. Please contact me via e-mail at support@hify.eu if you face any further issues and I will do my best to get it working well for you :) Kind regards from Germany.

content: Works perfectly for me (OnePlus 3T with LineageOS 15), the Yamaha amp I wanted to use annoyingly only supports AirPlay as a streaming option so this app was a great discovery. Used the trial version to make sure it worked ok and then got the premium. Now if only someone could do an app to support Crapples Airdrop photo sharing.
work perfectly, does exactly what I wanted, the only problem is that skipping songs can be a little slow (2-4 seconds) and a slight glitch inbetween songs.
replyContent: Hey Jason, many thanks for your nice feedback. The delay between the switch to a new song is often related to AirPlay-receivers as they use a buffering of 2 seconds. Otherwise, please make sure you didn't change the "quality"-setting to "extreme" as this would require a pretty fast internet-connection to load the songs. Kind regards from Germany :)

content: Great idea but sometimes it does not work it and when it works keep disconnecting in. The connection is slow and the music stops and keep playing again.
replyContent: Hey Jae, thanks for your feedback. This might be related to your Android's battery-settings and/or the internet-/Wifi-connection. Please contact me at support@hify.eu then we can try to get it working well for you :) Kind regards from Germany.

content: The only app were i can now airplay spotify with my older wifi speakers. Excellent!

App is great when it works, but too frequently it disconnects from Airplay for no reason and then won't reconnect without doing a full shutdown and restart of Spotify and HiFy. This is not the kind of poor stability I expect from an app that costs ¬£3.
replyContent: Hey Rashid please excuse the problem. This is often related to your Android's battery-settings or to the network. HiFy needs to hold a stable and persistent connection to Spotify's servers and this connection might get closed by moving around of by some energy-settings. Please contact me at support@hify.eu and we'll try to get it working for you :)

content: Most of the times works but sometimes stops and only plays after i reset my speaker
replyContent: Hey there, please excuse the issue. This is often related to the battery-settings of the Android. Some devices stop HiFy as it's running in the background and not in the foreground. Please contact me at support@hify.eu with some details and with some luck we can get it working well for you. Kind regards from Germany.

content: with pioneer vsx-921 work only 10 min. and must reboot app. I have Premium version.  EDIT: you have right, my settings in android have problem. Now is allright. Great app!!!
replyContent: Hey Marcin, this is often related to the battery-settings of the Android. Some devices stop HiFy as it's running in the background and not in the foreground. Please contact me at support@hify.eu with some details and with some luck we can get it working well for you. Kind regards from Germany.

content: Top app works with cyrus streamers

This app is exactly what I was looking for. If you have a Spotify Premium account, HiFi system that supports AirPlay / DLNA, and you wish to switch from Apple to Android, this is the app that can help you. You don't need to invest additional hardware to your HiFi to continue enjoying the music streaming service.  In case you do not know, there is a trial version that you can test it out before you purchase this. Changing track during playback is a bit slow but this does not stop me from giving this app 5 starts!
streams spotify to your DLNA device via Wi-Fi, no frills, just perfect üëç
5 STARS now! After the new update it solves the problem with browsing and playing tracks. It's now everything I need it to do. Superb.
replyContent: Hey Gary, thanks for your feedback. Your issues should be fixed with the next update coming soon :) The "quality"-setting is the same as the "quality"-setting within your Spotify-app. Please stay tuned for the next version :) Kind regards from Germany.

content: Not conected with sound seeder disappointed
replyContent: Hey Yoki, I am not sure what issue you are facing with SoundSeeder? HiFy is not related to SoundSeeder but both apps should work together. Please contact me at support@hify.eu for some help, or contact the developer of SoundSeeder for help. Please sure we can get it working well for you. Kind regards from Germany.

content: This app is just brilliant !! Enables Spotify sound to be cast to my Airport Express without rooting phone. Previously could only achieve this with root and rooting newest Galaxy phones has now become really difficult. Hope that whatever " hole" the developer found in Samsung's defensive wall is not found by Samsung and closed.
Great app now i can play on my airplay speaker. Got some bugs like you cant change current playlist that's playing. Hope developer would further develop the app. Cheers
replyContent: Hey Lou, thanks for your feedback. This problem with the playlist should have been solved with the latest version 1.2. Are you still facing this problem? Cheers & kind regards from Germany.

content: just works!!! on my pixel 3

Absolutely fabulous! Solved my problem after my audio receiver stopped to support Spotify connect. Bluetooth audio quality just sucks in comparison to Airplay. Big shame to Spotify, thumbs up to HiFy. One more thing to appreciate is the swift update times, in reaction to Spotify never-ending API changes. Last time it took less than 2 days to adopt. Many thanks to HiFy developers.
after the last update, the connection to apple tv now will no longer connect and to a denon amp, the is dnla no lonher stable ... please fix ... up to now it has been perfect up until now
replyContent:
Hey Jack, "tvOS 13.2 beta" solves the problem with the AppleTV!
This means you can either enroll to Apple's beta-program and directly update to 13.2, or you need to wait until it has been official released by Apple :-)

content: works perfectly

The app does its job by connecting with spotify, but it does not play songs that you have downloaded from online and put in spotify. I've also had a problem where I can only change tracks with the arrows on the spotify app and not physically tap the track I want to listen to. I'm not sure if this is something fixable on your end but would be nice if there was a way to solve this :) otherwise it works like a charm.
replyContent: Hey there, thanks for your feedback. Offline-songs are sadly (generally?) not possible via Spotify Connect, or I didn't know how to implement this yet. The skip-/track-issue was reproducible for me today and I will try to fix this directly :) Kind regards from Germany and stay tuned for updates.

content: Works really well for the most part üòÅ
Good apps but sadly it's not compatible with my current device. Good costumer service to.
replyContent: Hey Muhammad, thanks for the feedback. I am not aware of this issue, but it might be related to the notification shown by HiFy. Maybe you can "hide" the notification to get around this problem? Please fell free to contact me at support@hify.eu with some details and maybe we can fix this with your help :) Kind regards from Germany.

content: This one has really upgeaded my listening experience to music. though in the beginning i had some glitchs that found as related to my device at home, I was able to get great personal support from the developer himself. im using Hify for almost a year to broadcast spotify from my xiaomi mobile to my good old Denon 1912 AVR which supports DLNA and it works perfect. very important to have a stable wifi and good router at home. this app worth every cent.
exactly does what it promises. great app!
terrible app very hit and miss wether it plays a song. has bad delay to speaker when it does connect would not recommend
replyContent: Hey Robert, I'm sorry to read about your issues. Would you please contact me at support@hify.eu with some more details about your issues? With some luck we can figure it out or of course refund your money. Kind regards from Germany.

content: Just downloaded on my Huawei p20pro, having used the iPhone and airplay with b+W A7 for years. Pleasantly surprised it works well with sound quality unaffected. No drops. Well worth the price of the app, and as usual, android environment is not painful to be in (as compared to iPhone)!
I bought it without even tried it. The app allow me to play Spotify on my AK380 üëç. This is one of my best app. Sometimes the app kinda lag when change tracks and change volume button
German Quality. üòâ No useless functions. The app does exactly the one thing it's supposed to do.

Great to finally be able to stream Spotify to Airplay devices. Nice clean app. Connects well to Apple Airport Express but connections are a bit ropey to other devices. Four stars as it munches through battery.

Got the trial and it worked so perfectly that I knew I just had to give them credit and get the pro version because it does exactly what it says it does. Bravo team for a great app that actually solves a real problem I had perfectly.
Works exactly as it has. Volume sliders available, also!
Has solved the problem of no longer supporting a Panasonic A4 XW-SMA4-K wifi-speaker by Spotify !!! With this app my speaker can be selected in Spotify.
It would get full stars but the app keeps starting and drains my battery Devs please fix it
Finally I can play Spotify through my marantz MCR603. Purchased straight away and works great so far. Thank you üôè
Love it!
Wonderful app. Solved connectivity issues with my Pioneer N50A.
Been waiting for this for some time... Thank you! It does what it's supposed to do. I bought the full version instantly!
So pleased with this. At last I can stream direct from my phone to my Airstream A100 amp after 3 years of waiting for a suitable app.
It works with apple tv. Finally i can listen spotify on apple tv. I like this app.
Drags a bit but still great option to steam spotify without connect feature in your player

I have a Mac with Airport Extreme& Express in different rooms and Streams simultaneoudly all over...But I'm an Android guy that listens to a lot of Spotify while on the Go...This App. Does just what I need it to....Play Spotify tunes on one Airport Express from my phone or Tablet...I only wish it could stream radio also....

I have recently switched to using an android on the mobile. Been looking for an app that works (without diluting sound quality of course) with my home Apple Airport express audio setup. Finally got this! Amazing! Trialed for 5mins and paid for Pro version right away!
Spotify discontinued connect capabilities for my pioneer av receiver. Got chrome cast but doesn't work properly with spotify. Now I can connect directly again. Great app so far.
Works flawlessly

I'm so happy to have found this. Onkyo ended Spotify support on my TX5020 and my go-to dnla app, bubblesoft, supports streaming from Google play but not Spotify. So this was a blessing. So far no issues, but I've only used it for a day.
Very good app, is there any way it can display album art on the TV?
replyContent: Hey Luis, thanks for your feedback. The alum artwork should already be transmitted. Can you please contact me with some details at support@hify.eu? Cheers & kind regards from Germany.

content: it worked at first. now i cannot see my device on the spotify app.
replyContent: Hey Ted, thanks for the feedback. Spotify has sometimes issues with detecting the devices around. Please open HiFy and swipe-down to force a new publishing of the devices. Also, closing & re-opening the Spotify-app is often the best trick. Please contact me at support@hify.eu if the problem persists :) Kind regards from Germany.

content: working but stop every song in a playlist
replyContent: Hey Oliver, thanks for your feedback. This can happen with some specific receivers. Please contact me at support@hify.eu then we will try to get it working well for you :-) kind regards from Germany.

content: App does what it's supposed to do. Easy to use. Would recommend
Doesn't work first 4x times, had to restart Spotify to get it running but very lagging.
replyContent: Hey Daniel, thanks for your feedback. Please make sure your Android has a stable & fast internet-connection and a good connection to your receiver. Then things should normally work well. Please contact me at support@hify.eu for any help! Kind regards from Germany :)

content: Very helpful. This app help connect my spotify and chord poly.
Works pretty good afterall.
replyContent: Hey Kevin, sorry for the problem. Please make sure you stopped + uninstalled the trial-version.. I think the trial is still running in the background. If the problem persists, contact me at support@hify.eu for some help :-) Kind regards from Germany.

content: Easy to use, it does what it promised (Marantz SR7005)

Excellent app however only seems to let you plat one song at a time spotify 
? Wont play full album, always pauses after one track? Help!! Edit ***** 
all sorted now, I needed to use airplay connection rather than dlna :) 
developer helped me sort it instantly :) top app, top developer

Been having trouble playing spotify on my denon avr, got the trial to this 
app. Worked 1st time, easy to use. Instantly paid for the full version. 
Thanks. Can listen to some nice loud music again.

App is good and works, but requires you to have an internet connection. 
Suggestion: remove internet connection requirement, not needed in the case 
when you're hotspotting an external DAC/Player.
replyContent: Hey Peter, we cannot get around the internet-requirement. This is how "Spotify Connect" works. HiFy is controlled by Spotify's servers and has to load the songs in realtime from them. It's impossible to use Spotify-Connect without internet, that's Spotify's way of implementation. Please use "AirAudio" instead and contact me for details & help :)

content: Works better than spotimote... great thanks!
can only play 1 song at a time. the trial app does not have this problem.
replyContent: Hey Marlvin, please excuse the issue. The trial- and the pro-version are identical, so I think and hope it's just a temporary issue, maybe due to internet-issues or issues with Spotify's servers. Please reboot your Android, receiver and router and try again. If the issue persists, please send me a message at support@hify.eu for help :) Kind regards

content: Great app! Very helpful developer
